name: @bect/tanggalan
description: Pustaka lengkap untuk konversi Kalender Jawa.

scripts.build:pages: npm run build && rm -rf pages/dist && mkdir -p pages/dist/js pages/dist/css && cp dist/tanggalan.min.js pages/dist/ && cp pages/index.html pages/dist/ && cp pages/preview.html pages/dist/ && esbuild pages/js/app.js --bundle --minify --outfile=pages/dist/js/bundle.min.js && esbuild pages/css/style.css --bundle --minify --outfile=pages/dist/css/style.min.css
scripts.test: node test/functional.js && node test/pasaran_validation.js && node test/kabisat.js && node test/get_gregorian.js && node test/date_difference.js && node test/next_weton.js
scripts.preview: npm run build:pages && npx serve pages/dist

author: bect
